attributes.action: Remove Human Rights from prisoners and treat as free labourers for public works
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If prisoners are capable of such acts as; asault, robbery, criminal damage etc. Any crime that involves getting their backside out of a chair/ bed, then they are more than capable of being employed on public works, and saving some money from the law abiding british taxpayer
